name: Yoke Messenger
overview:
Yoke is a chat application that works on 3 platforms: iPhone, Blackbery and Android. It gives you an opportunity to communicate with all friends, using one app for Free.

Yoke messenger works wherever you have internet access (Wi-Fi, edge or 3G) and has all the features of existing messenger apps such as: push notifications, sending pictures, location, group chats, read receipts, etc…
But has taken it all a step further.

Yoke Messenger has Message edition feature,You are able to edit a chat, if it has not been read. You can also edit chats for five minutes after they were read.

Only Yoke friends can see each others’ statuses and profile pictures, ensuring privacy of your data.
